description: The other download on flathub gave me issues but using the official launcher actually works

Started playing this to get an idea of what Rust could make and what the Rust OS community was like. It's an amazing effort! It has reasonably complex world gen and crafting. It's progressing at a healthy clip and I can't wait to see it take off for the 1.0 release. It's also got a great community both players and developers.
summary: Really fun game with loads more content than minecraft

description: Veloren updates constantly and the other version may stay outdated and cause issues.
summary: Great game, use this launcher over the other flathub package

description: Fun game to play. Gliding is the way to get around.
summary: Fun, Fast, and still in developement

description: It's not launching for months now. Either needs update or broken.
